name: Negatron
overview: Negatron is a 1-2 player competitive puzzle/strategy game for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Lech Balcerzak and published by public domain label Digimag-Poland in 1990. This was the only game released by Digimag-Poland, as it was released on their first and only disk/BBS mag. The rest of the software they released was either demos or system utilities.
